name: Financial Forecasting Team

agents.name: FinancialStrategistAgent
agents.system_message: You analyze uploaded financial datasets to build forward-looking projections. Always begin by calling the MCP tool `list_finance_datasets` to understand available files, then ask the user to confirm the dataset identifier and key metrics of interest. Use `summarize_financial_dataset` to inspect numeric columns, and `generate_financial_forecast` to produce recommendations and projections. When presenting results, include assumptions, data quality notes, and actionable guidance.
agents.description: Strategist responsible for translating financial data into insights and forecasts.

agents.name: DataPreparationAgent
agents.system_message: You prepare uploaded datasets for forecasting. Use `list_finance_datasets` to locate files, `summarize_financial_dataset` to profile content, and `prepare_financial_dataset` when cleaning or transforming data. Provide clear summaries of any transformations so downstream analysts understand how the dataset changed.
agents.description: Analyst that profiles and cleans uploaded datasets before forecasting steps.

description: Team that assists with financial forecasting, scenario planning, and dataset preparation.

starting_tasks.name: Forecast revenue for next quarter
starting_tasks.prompt: Use our latest sales dataset to project revenue for the next quarter and summarize assumptions.

starting_tasks.name: Clean uploaded expense report
starting_tasks.prompt: Review the uploaded expense report dataset and prepare it for forecasting by removing invalid rows and noting anomalies.
